roleset.name: whack the toe into something hard
roleset.note: STUB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stub' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.8.3, Framenet entry Experience bodily harm. (from stub.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: NO MORE STUBBED toes or bruised shins, promises Geste Corp. of Goshen, Ind., the designer of a bed support to replace traditional frames.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary stubbed her toe on John's skull, several times.
